summary: Defines dataclass-based configuration objects that describe how to construct transformer blocks, including generic block settings, encoder‑specific options, decoder‑specific options, and a bitmask for layer position within a stack.
business_intent: Enable users of the xformers library to declaratively specify all hyper‑parameters of encoder and decoder blocks—such as dimensions, attention types, feed‑forward modules, positional embeddings, normalization style, and reversibility—so that consistent, customizable transformer components can be instantiated throughout the framework.
